Original Persona: A aspiring engineer who spends hours in the garage building and modifying machines
Expanded Persona:
Name: Alex Carter  
Gender Identity: Male  
Racial Identity: Caucasian  

Expanded Persona:  
Born in 1979, Alex Carter is an aspiring engineer with a passion for building and modifying machines. He spends countless hours in his garage, where he finds solace and creativity in tinkering with engines, gadgets, and mechanical systems. Despite his deep technical interest, Alex is always eager to learn something new and stays updated with the latest engineering innovations. His love for engineering extends beyond just machines—he enjoys sharing his knowledge with others and finding innovative solutions to everyday problems. Alex appreciates the tranquility of working independently, yet he recognizes the value of collaboration and often seeks out fellow enthusiasts to exchange ideas.

Personal Hobbies:
- Restoring vintage motorcycles
- Designing custom robot prototypes
- Collecting rare engineering tools
- Photography, especially of industrial sites
- Attending engineering expos and conventions

Things Alex Dislikes:
- Pop music, preferring classic rock hits instead
- Reality television, finding more value in documentary series
- Crowded urban environments, favoring the peace of his suburban surroundings
- Fast food, enjoying the process of cooking homemade meals
- Fashion trends, favoring functional and comfortable clothing
